TIPS.MSG: If you have any inquiries about GunZ, you may use the Helpdesk function on the GunZ Main Page.
You can view a replay by double clicking the replay files located in .../My Documents/Gunz/Replay.
Press the F11 key to start recording a replay file. Press F11 again to stop recording.
You can view a replay file by selecting "Replay" in the Main Lobby.
Screenshots are saved in .../My Documents/Gunz/Screenshots.
Join a Clan now so you can experience a Clan War!
Press the F12 key to take a screenshot.
Tell your friends about GunZ. Together you can make a Clan.
All premium items can be shared through the "Storage" with every character on the same account.
Do you use a router? Try port forwarding to experience optimized network play.
You can give your friend an item as a present by using the gift function on the webpage.
Is GunZ running slow on your computer? Use the optimization feature in the Options menu.
You can use the "Play Now" function to quickly join a game.
Never give your password to anyone. The administrator will never ask you for your password.
The premium items bought in the item shop will appear in your "Storage".
Bounty items cannot be shared with other characters through your "Storage".
Use training mode to practice your skills without losing experience points.
Use the chat command '/r' to quickly reply to a whisper.
If you have a level 21 character, you cannot enter the Entry-level or Beginner Channel with any other characters.
Any Game ID that may offend others will be restricted.
Anyone who offends others inside a game will be subject to punishment by the operating team.
If you successfully defend yourself against a melee attack, you have a chance to perform a Massive Strike right away!
Press the Ctrl key+any Number while in observer mode to assign a number to a player.
Have you played the exciting Clan War? Try it now!
In a Clan War you will receive 1.5 times the Exp. There is no loss of Exp. resulting from the level difference.
For stable latency, please select a server which accurately reflects your geographical location.
